summary: Provides utilities to compute and represent differences between Feast infrastructure objects, such as datastore, DynamoDB, and SQLite tables, by comparing their protobuf definitions and tracking changes (additions, deletions, modifications). Includes a class for aggregating property-level diffs and helper functions for extracting and tagging infra objects.
business_intent: Enable automated detection and reporting of changes in the underlying data store configurations of a Feast feature store, facilitating migration planning, version control, and consistency checks.
